title: "Wrangle"

## Data Wrangling with dplyr

### Select columns

```r
data |> select(id, age, score)
```

### Filter rows

```r
data |> filter(age > 18)
```

### Create new variables

```r
data |> mutate(score_centered = score - mean(score))
```

### Summarise data

```r
data |>
  group_by(condition) |>
  summarise(mean_score = mean(score), sd_score = sd(score))
```
